original_text: All the doorways had rectangular frames; they were in the front part in sets of three, facing each other.
korean_text: 모든 문과 문설주를 다 큰 나무로 네모지게 만들었는데 창과 창이 세 층으로 서로 마주 대하였으며

sentences.original_text: All the doorways had rectangular frames
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 문들은 직사각형 틀을 가지고 있었고

sentences.original_text: they were in the front part
